member.name: M:BB.BoggleBoard.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a BoggleBoard from the provided 16-letter string. The method is case-insensitive. If there aren't exactly 16 letters in the string, throws an ArgumentException. The string consists of the first row, then the second row, then the third, then the fourth.

member.name: M:BB.BoggleBoard.MakeBoard(System.String)
member.summary: Makes a board from the 16-letter string

member.name: M:BB.BoggleBoard.ToString
member.summary: Returns the 16 letters that make up this board. It is formed by appending the first row to the second row to the third row to the fourth row.

member.name: M:BB.BoggleBoard.CanBeFormed(System.String)
member.summary: Reports whether the provided word can be formed by tracking through this Boggle board as described in the rules of Boggle. The method is case-insensitive.

member.name: M:BB.BoggleBoard.CanBeFormed(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean[0:,0:])
member.summary: Reports whether the provided word can be formed by tracking through this Boggle board by beginning at location [i,j] and avoiding any squares marked as visited.
